surface_layer.definition: The interaction between plasma and the wall of a device.

deep_layer.mechanism: Plasma particles impacting and reacting with wall materials.
deep_layer.origin: Occurs in plasma devices such as tokamaks.

core_premise: Plasma can damage or alter wall materials.

precondition: Plasma is in contact with wall
